[Race No. 1]
Applicable Subject: Boat No. 1
Applicable Regulation: Article 60 of the Motorboat Racing Rules (Prohibition of Contact)
Review Details: During the first lap at the second turn mark, due to improper steering and stalling, Boat No. 3 was unable to continue and Boats No. 2 and No. 5 became incapable of navigation, with Boat No. 1 determined to have caused the incident, resulting in disqualification.

ⓒ If racing videos from private YouTube channels or other social media platforms are used (including edited content), the source “Cycling and Boating General Headquarters” must be credited in accordance with Article 37 of the Copyright Act. Failure to do so may result in penalties under Article 138(2) of the Copyright Act.
